page.title: 05WICHENFORD VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: {Wichenford's population is varied. There are many{elderly residents,}and with the housing estates, quite a few {young families.}New private homes have been built by{Worcester businessmen. {Life styles also vary.}Traditionally a farming community, many{farmers}and farm workers still enjoy the village. The Council houses are occupied by {town dwellers}who use Martley, Hallow and Worcester more, and new residents tend to{commute to Worcester}where their children attend{private schools. Some interesting{house restoration}is seen in older buildings, one fine example is{The Forge.}This 350 year old{farm house}has been carefully re- constructed;{wooden beams}are exposed and{wattle and daub}infill repaired with brick. The original{smithy}is now a{Granny flat,}and an old{cider press is set into the garden as a pond.
